nbsOtnpmMib.name: nbsOtnpmMib
nbsOtnpmMib.contactinfo: For technical support, please contact your service channel
nbsOtnpmMib.description: OTN Performance Monitoring and user-controlled statistics

nbsOtnpmCurrentGrp.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentGrp
nbsOtnpmCurrentGrp.description: Subtotals and statistics for sample now underway

nbsOtnpmHistoricGrp.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricGrp
nbsOtnpmHistoricGrp.description: Totals and final statistics for a previous sample

nbsOtnpmRunningGrp.name: nbsOtnpmRunningGrp
nbsOtnpmRunningGrp.description: Totals and statistics since (boot-up) protocol configuration

NbsOtnAlarmId.name: NbsOtnAlarmId
NbsOtnAlarmId.description: OTN alarm id, also used to identify a mask bit

NbsOtnAlarmMask.name: NbsOtnAlarmMask
NbsOtnAlarmMask.description: OTN alarm mask, encoded within an octet string. The bit assigned to a particular alarm (id from NbsOtnAlarmId) is calculated by: index = id/8; bit = id%8; where the leftmost bit (msb) is deemed as bit 0. The mask length is either full-size or zero if not supported.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsEntry.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsEntry
nbsOtnpmThresholdsEntry.description: Performance monitoring thresholds for a particular interface

nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval
nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval.description: Indicates the sampling period to which these thresholds apply

nbsOtnpmThresholdsScope.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsScope
nbsOtnpmThresholdsScope.description: This object specifies the network segment to which these thresholds apply.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsEs.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsEs
nbsOtnpmThresholdsEs.description: Persistent. The number of Errored Seconds (ES) which, if met or exceeded at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period, should trigger the nbsOtnpmTrapsEs event notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrSig.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrSig
nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrSig.description: Persistent. The significand of the Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR) threshold, which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrExp An ESR that meets or exceeds this threshold at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period triggers the nbsOtnpmTrapsEsr event notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrExp.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrExp
nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrExp.description: Persistent. The exponent of the Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR) threshold; see nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmThresholdsSes.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsSes
nbsOtnpmThresholdsSes.description: Persistent. The number of Severely Errored Seconds (SES) which, if met or exceeded at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period, should trigger the nbsOtnpmTrapsSes event notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrSig.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrSig
nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrSig.description: Persistent. The significand of the Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR) threshold, which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrExp A SESR that meets or exceeds this threshold at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period triggers the nbsOtnpmTrapsSesr notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrExp.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrExp
nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrExp.description: Persistent. The exponent of the Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR) threshold; see nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmThresholdsBbe.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsBbe
nbsOtnpmThresholdsBbe.description: Persistent. The number of Background Block Errors (BBE) which, if met or exceeded at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period, should trigger the nbsOtnpmTrapsBbe event notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberSig.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberSig
nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberSig.description: Persistent. The significand of the Background Block Errors Ratio (BBER) threshold, which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberSig x 10^nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberExp A BBER that meets or exceeds this threshold at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period triggers the nbsOtnpmTrapsBber notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberExp.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberExp
nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberExp.description: Persistent. The exponent of the Background Block Errors Ratio (BBER) threshold; see nbsOtnpmThresholdsBberSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmThresholdsUas.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsUas
nbsOtnpmThresholdsUas.description: Persistent. The number of Unavailable Seconds (UAS) which, if met or exceeded at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period, should trigger the nbsOtnpmTrapsUas event notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmThresholdsFc.name: nbsOtnpmThresholdsFc
nbsOtnpmThresholdsFc.description: Persistent. The number of Failure Counts (FC) which, if met or exceeded at the end of the nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval period, should trigger the nbsOtnpmTrapsFc event notification. The reserved value 0 disables notifications for this event.

nbsOtnpmCurrentTable.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentTable
nbsOtnpmCurrentTable.description: All OTN Performance Monitoring statistics for the nbsOtnpmCurrentInterval now underway.

nbsOtnpmCurrentEntry.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentEntry
nbsOtnpmCurrentEntry.description: OTN Performance Monitoring statistics for a specific port/ interface and nbsOtnpmCurrentInterval.

nbsOtnpmCurrentInterval.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentInterval
nbsOtnpmCurrentInterval.description: Indicates the sampling period of statistic

nbsOtnpmCurrentDate.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentDate
nbsOtnpmCurrentDate.description: The date (UTC) this interval began, represented by an eight digit decimal number: yyyymmdd

nbsOtnpmCurrentTime.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentTime
nbsOtnpmCurrentTime.description: The time (UTC) this interval began, represented by a six digit decimal number: hhmmss

nbsOtnpmCurrentEs.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentEs
nbsOtnpmCurrentEs.description: The number of Errored Seconds (ES) in this interval so far.

nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrSig.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrSig
nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrSig.description: The significand of the current Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR), which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrExp

nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrExp.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrExp
nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrExp.description: The exponent of the current Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR); see nbsOtnpmCurrentEsrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmCurrentSes.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentSes
nbsOtnpmCurrentSes.description: The number of Severely Errored Seconds (SES) in this interval so far

nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrSig.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrSig
nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrSig.description: The significand of the current Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR), which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrExp

nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrExp.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrExp
nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrExp.description: The exponent of the current Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR); see nbsOtnpmCurrentSesrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmCurrentBbe.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentBbe
nbsOtnpmCurrentBbe.description: The number of Background Block Errors (BBE) so far, i.e. the count of Bit Interleave Parity (BIP8) errors.

nbsOtnpmCurrentBberSig.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentBberSig
nbsOtnpmCurrentBberSig.description: The significand of the current Background Block Errors (BBER), which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmCurrentBberSig x 10^nbsOtnpmCurrentBberExp

nbsOtnpmCurrentBberExp.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentBberExp
nbsOtnpmCurrentBberExp.description: The exponent of the current Background Block Errors Ratio (BBER); see nbsOtnpmCurrentBberSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmCurrentUas.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentUas
nbsOtnpmCurrentUas.description: The number of Unavailable Seconds (UAS) so far

nbsOtnpmCurrentFc.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentFc
nbsOtnpmCurrentFc.description: The number of Failure Counts (FC) so far, i.e. the count of Backward Error Indication (BEI) errors.

nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsSupported.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsSupported
nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsSupported.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are supported.

nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsRaised.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsRaised
nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsRaised.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are currently raised.

nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsChanged.name: nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsChanged
nbsOtnpmCurrentAlarmsChanged.description: The mask of OTN alarms that have changed so far, i.e. alarms that have transitioned at least once from clear to raised or from raised to clear.

nbsOtnpmHistoricTable.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricTable
nbsOtnpmHistoricTable.description: All OTN Performance Monitoring statistics for past nbsOtnpmHistoricInterval periods.

nbsOtnpmHistoricEntry.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricEntry
nbsOtnpmHistoricEntry.description: OTN Performance Monitoring statistics for a specific port/ interface and nbsOtnpmHistoricInterval.

nbsOtnpmHistoricInterval.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricInterval
nbsOtnpmHistoricInterval.description: Indicates the sampling period of statistic

nbsOtnpmHistoricSample.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricSample
nbsOtnpmHistoricSample.description: Indicates the sample number of this statistic. The most recent sample is numbered 1, the next previous 2, and so on until the oldest sample.

nbsOtnpmHistoricDate.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricDate
nbsOtnpmHistoricDate.description: The date (UTC) the interval began, represented by an eight digit decimal number: yyyymmdd

nbsOtnpmHistoricTime.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricTime
nbsOtnpmHistoricTime.description: The time (UTC) the interval began, represented by a six digit decimal number: hhmmss

nbsOtnpmHistoricEs.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricEs
nbsOtnpmHistoricEs.description: The final count of Errored Seconds (ES) for this interval

nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrSig.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrSig
nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrSig.description: The significand of the final Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR) for this interval, which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrExp

nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrExp.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrExp
nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrExp.description: The exponent of the final Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR) for this interval; see nbsOtnpmHistoricEsrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmHistoricSes.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricSes
nbsOtnpmHistoricSes.description: The final count of Severely Errored Seconds (SES) in this interval

nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrSig.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrSig
nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrSig.description: The significand of the final Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR) for this interval, which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrExp

nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrExp.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrExp
nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrExp.description: The exponent of the final Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR) for this interval; see nbsOtnpmHistoricSesrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmHistoricBbe.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricBbe
nbsOtnpmHistoricBbe.description: The final count of Background Block Errors (BBE), i.e. the count of Bit Interleave Parity (BIP8) errors.

nbsOtnpmHistoricBberSig.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricBberSig
nbsOtnpmHistoricBberSig.description: The significand of the final Background Block Errors Ratio (BBER) for this interval, which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmHistoricBberSig x 10^nbsOtnpmHistoricBberExp)

nbsOtnpmHistoricBberExp.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricBberExp
nbsOtnpmHistoricBberExp.description: The exponent of the final Background Block Errors Ratio (BBER) for this interval; see nbsOtnpmHistoricBberSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmHistoricUas.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricUas
nbsOtnpmHistoricUas.description: The final count of Unavailable Seconds (UAS)

nbsOtnpmHistoricFc.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricFc
nbsOtnpmHistoricFc.description: The final number of Failure Counts (FC), i.e. the count of Backward Error Indication (BEI) errors.

nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsSupported.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsSupported
nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsSupported.description: The mask of OTN alarms that were supported.

nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsRaised.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsRaised
nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsRaised.description: The mask of OTN alarms that were raised at the end of this interval.

nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsChanged.name: nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsChanged
nbsOtnpmHistoricAlarmsChanged.description: The mask of OTN alarms that changed in this interval, i.e. alarms that transitioned at least once from clear to raised or from raised to clear.

nbsOtnpmRunningTable.name: nbsOtnpmRunningTable
nbsOtnpmRunningTable.description: All OTN Performance Monitoring statistics since (boot-up) protocol configuration.

nbsOtnpmRunningEntry.name: nbsOtnpmRunningEntry
nbsOtnpmRunningEntry.description: OTN Performance Monitoring statistics for a specific port/ interface.

nbsOtnpmRunningDate.name: nbsOtnpmRunningDate
nbsOtnpmRunningDate.description: The date (UTC) of protocol configuration, represented by an eight digit decimal number: yyyymmdd

nbsOtnpmRunningTime.name: nbsOtnpmRunningTime
nbsOtnpmRunningTime.description: The time (UTC) of protocol configuration, represented by a six digit decimal number: hhmmss

nbsOtnpmRunningEs.name: nbsOtnpmRunningEs
nbsOtnpmRunningEs.description: The number of Errored Seconds (ES) since protocol configuration.

nbsOtnpmRunningEsrSig.name: nbsOtnpmRunningEsrSig
nbsOtnpmRunningEsrSig.description: The significand of the running Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR), which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmRunningEsrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmRunningEsrExp

nbsOtnpmRunningEsrExp.name: nbsOtnpmRunningEsrExp
nbsOtnpmRunningEsrExp.description: The exponent of the running Errored Seconds Ratio (ESR); see nbsOtnpmRunningEsrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmRunningSes.name: nbsOtnpmRunningSes
nbsOtnpmRunningSes.description: The number of Severely Errored Seconds (SES) since protocol configuration

nbsOtnpmRunningSesrSig.name: nbsOtnpmRunningSesrSig
nbsOtnpmRunningSesrSig.description: The significand of the running Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR), which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmRunningSesrSig x 10^nbsOtnpmRunningSesrExp

nbsOtnpmRunningSesrExp.name: nbsOtnpmRunningSesrExp
nbsOtnpmRunningSesrExp.description: The exponent of the running Severely Errored Seconds Ratio (SESR); see nbsOtnpmRunningSesrSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmRunningBbe.name: nbsOtnpmRunningBbe
nbsOtnpmRunningBbe.description: The number of Background Block Errors (BBE) since protocol configuration, i.e. the count of Bit Interleave Parity (BIP8) errors.

nbsOtnpmRunningBberSig.name: nbsOtnpmRunningBberSig
nbsOtnpmRunningBberSig.description: The significand of the running Background Block Errors (BBER), which is calculated by: nbsOtnpmRunningBberSig x 10^nbsOtnpmRunningBberExp

nbsOtnpmRunningBberExp.name: nbsOtnpmRunningBberExp
nbsOtnpmRunningBberExp.description: The exponent of the running Background Block Errors Ratio (BBER); see nbsOtnpmRunningBberSig. Not supported value: 0x80000000

nbsOtnpmRunningUas.name: nbsOtnpmRunningUas
nbsOtnpmRunningUas.description: The number of Unavailable Seconds (UAS) since protocol configuration

nbsOtnpmRunningFc.name: nbsOtnpmRunningFc
nbsOtnpmRunningFc.description: The number of Failure Counts (FC) since protocol configuration, i.e. the count of Backward Error Indication (BEI) errors.

nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsSupported.name: nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsSupported
nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsSupported.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are supported.

nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsRaised.name: nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsRaised
nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsRaised.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are currently raised.

nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsChanged.name: nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsChanged
nbsOtnpmRunningAlarmsChanged.description: The mask of OTN alarms that changed since protocol configuration, i.e. alarms that transitioned at least once from clear to raised or from raised to clear.

nbsOtnAlarmsTable.name: nbsOtnAlarmsTable
nbsOtnAlarmsTable.description: OTN alarm monitoring scoreboard, showing for each possible alarm if it is currently raised and if it has changed since monitoring began (or was cleared). The latter indicator may be cleared at anytime without affecting normal performance monitoring activity.

nbsOtnAlarmsEntry.name: nbsOtnAlarmsEntry
nbsOtnAlarmsEntry.description: OTN alarm monitoring scoreboard for a specific port/interface.

nbsOtnAlarmsDate.name: nbsOtnAlarmsDate
nbsOtnAlarmsDate.description: The date (UTC) OTN alarm monitoring began (was cleared), represented by an eight digit decimal number: yyyymmdd

nbsOtnAlarmsTime.name: nbsOtnAlarmsTime
nbsOtnAlarmsTime.description: The time (UTC) OTN alarm monitoring began (was cleared), represented by a six digit decimal number: hhmmss

nbsOtnAlarmsSpan.name: nbsOtnAlarmsSpan
nbsOtnAlarmsSpan.description: The amount of time (deci-sec) since nbsOtnAlarmsDate and nbsOtnAlarmsTime.

nbsOtnAlarmsState.name: nbsOtnAlarmsState
nbsOtnAlarmsState.description: This object reads 'notSupported' if the port is not configured with an OTN protocol. Otherwise it reads 'monitoring' to indicate that supported OTN alarms are actively reported in nbsOtnAlarmsRaised and nbsOtnAlarmsChanged. Writing 'clearing' to this object clears nbsOtnAlarmsChanged.

nbsOtnAlarmsSupported.name: nbsOtnAlarmsSupported
nbsOtnAlarmsSupported.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are supported on this port.

nbsOtnAlarmsRaised.name: nbsOtnAlarmsRaised
nbsOtnAlarmsRaised.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are currently raised.

nbsOtnAlarmsChanged.name: nbsOtnAlarmsChanged
nbsOtnAlarmsChanged.description: The mask of OTN alarms that have changed since nbsOtnAlarmsDate and AlarmsTime, i.e. alarms that have transitioned at least once from clear to raised or from raised to clear.

nbsOtnAlarmsRcvdFTFL.name: nbsOtnAlarmsRcvdFTFL
nbsOtnAlarmsRcvdFTFL.description: The current Fault Type Fault Location information received on the given port. The length will be zero when there is a no fault code in both the forward and backward fields. Otherwise, the full 256 bytes will be provided; see ITU-T G.709, section 15.8.2.5.

nbsOtnStatsTable.name: nbsOtnStatsTable
nbsOtnStatsTable.description: OTN alarms and statistics monitoring managed per user discretion. This monitoring may be started, stopped, and cleared as desired without affecting the normal performance monitoring activity.

nbsOtnStatsEntry.name: nbsOtnStatsEntry
nbsOtnStatsEntry.description: User-controlled OTN monitoring for a specific port/interface.

nbsOtnStatsDate.name: nbsOtnStatsDate
nbsOtnStatsDate.description: The date (UTC) OTN statistics collection began, represented by an eight digit decimal number: yyyymmdd

nbsOtnStatsTime.name: nbsOtnStatsTime
nbsOtnStatsTime.description: The time (UTC) OTN statistics collection began, represented by a six digit decimal number: hhmmss

nbsOtnStatsSpan.name: nbsOtnStatsSpan
nbsOtnStatsSpan.description: The amount of time (deci-sec) statistics collection has been underway since nbsOtnStatsDate and nbsOtnStatsTime, or if stopped, the duration of the prior collection.

nbsOtnStatsState.name: nbsOtnStatsState
nbsOtnStatsState.description: Writing 'stopped' to this object stops (pauses) OTN statistics collection. Re-configuring this port to a non-OTN protocol sets this object to 'stopped' automatically. Writing 'counting' to this object starts (resumes) OTN statistics collection if this port is configured with an OTN protocol. Writing 'clearing' to this object clears all statistical counters.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntSectBEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntSectBEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntSectBEI.description: The count of section Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntPathBEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntPathBEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntPathBEI.description: The count of path Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm1BEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm1BEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm1BEI.description: The count of TCM1 Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm2BEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm2BEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm2BEI.description: The count of TCM2 Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm3BEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm3BEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm3BEI.description: The count of TCM3 Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm4BEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm4BEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm4BEI.description: The count of TCM4 Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm5BEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm5BEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm5BEI.description: The count of TCM5 Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm6BEI.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm6BEI
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm6BEI.description: The count of TCM6 Backward Error Indication errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntSectBIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntSectBIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntSectBIP8.description: The count of section Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntPathBIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntPathBIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntPathBIP8.description: The count of path Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm1BIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm1BIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm1BIP8.description: The count of TCM1 Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm2BIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm2BIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm2BIP8.description: The count of TCM2 Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm3BIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm3BIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm3BIP8.description: The count of TCM3 Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm4BIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm4BIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm4BIP8.description: The count of TCM4 Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm5BIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm5BIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm5BIP8.description: The count of TCM5 Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm6BIP8.name: nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm6BIP8
nbsOtnStatsErrCntTcm6BIP8.description: The count of TCM6 Bit Interleave Parity errors detected since OTN statistics collection began.

nbsOtnStatsAlarmsSupported.name: nbsOtnStatsAlarmsSupported
nbsOtnStatsAlarmsSupported.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are supported.

nbsOtnStatsAlarmsRaised.name: nbsOtnStatsAlarmsRaised
nbsOtnStatsAlarmsRaised.description: The mask of OTN alarms that are currently raised.

nbsOtnStatsAlarmsChanged.name: nbsOtnStatsAlarmsChanged
nbsOtnStatsAlarmsChanged.description: The mask of OTN alarms that have changed since OTN statistics collection began, i.e. alarms that have transitioned at least once from clear to raised or from raised to clear.

nbsOtnpmTrapsEs.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsEs
nbsOtnpmTrapsEs.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsEs is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentEs.

nbsOtnpmTrapsEsr.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsEsr
nbsOtnpmTrapsEsr.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsEsr is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentEsr.

nbsOtnpmTrapsSes.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsSes
nbsOtnpmTrapsSes.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsSes is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentSes.

nbsOtnpmTrapsSesr.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsSesr
nbsOtnpmTrapsSesr.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsSesr is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentSesr.

nbsOtnpmTrapsBbe.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsBbe
nbsOtnpmTrapsBbe.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsBbe is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentBbe.

nbsOtnpmTrapsBber.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsBber
nbsOtnpmTrapsBber.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsBber is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentBber.

nbsOtnpmTrapsUas.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsUas
nbsOtnpmTrapsUas.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsUas is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentUas.

nbsOtnpmTrapsFc.name: nbsOtnpmTrapsFc
nbsOtnpmTrapsFc.description: Sent at the conclusion of an nbsOtnpmThresholdsInterval if nbsOtnpmThresholdsFc is non-zero and less than or equal to nbsOtnpmCurrentFc.
